title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with multi-user support, markdown, code highlighting and dark mode.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive REPL wrapper around the Ollama HTTP API with readline history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code plugin via a local proxy.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example that ingests PDFs and chats over them with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and explain code using any Ollama model without leaving the editor.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-based Slack bot that threads replies powered by a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run LLM prompts against Ollama and insert results directly into your notes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package providing a chat API endpoint and admin UI that proxies to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate with strongly-typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: One-file Streamlit app for chatting with any Ollama model, including session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that streams answers from Ollama; supports group topics and per-user model selection.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly client.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting and OpenAI-style endpoints in front of Ollama.
